item.title: Google+ shutdown: fixing Google authentication in ASP.NET Core
item.description: A few months ago, Google decided to shutdown Google+, due to multiple data leaks. More recently, they announced that the Google+ APIs will be shutdown on March 7, 2019, which is pretty soon!
